id: scenario-public-observer-board-member-scenarios-educational-board member prepares for teacher contract negotiation
title: Board member prepares for teacher contract negotiation
description: Board member prepares for teacher contract negotiation
content:
Scenario: Board member prepares for teacher contract negotiation
    Given board must negotiate collective bargaining agreement with teachers union
    And superintendent provides analysis emphasizing district's budget constraints
    And board wants to balance fiscal responsibility with teacher retention and quality
    When the board member uses Observer labor relations context
    Then they receive comparison of district's teacher compensation to regional market
    And see teacher turnover and vacancy data by school showing retention challenges
    And access analysis of contract proposals' impact on recruitment and budget
    And get examples of creative solutions from peer district negotiations
    And accessible expertise helps board negotiate effectively
